operations.target_text: Guest Network Access: Visitors to the Company can access guest networks by registering with the office personnel, bypassing the need for a formal access request.
operations.comment: Customer has no physical office. Guest network access section removed as it's not applicable to their business model.
Customer uses Clickup for version control. Source code access controls remain relevant for their development workflow.

operations.target_text: Password management systems should be user-friendly
operations.comment: Customer uses 1Password for password management. 1Password = enterprise-grade with good UX; Bitwarden = cost-effective; LastPass = widely adopted but security concerns; Built-in browser = convenient but limited security.

operations.target_text: All requests will be sent by email to <email>
operations.replacement: All requests will be processed through the Clickup ticketing system
operations.comment: Customer uses Clickup as their ticketing system for access requests. Email = simple but no tracking; Ticketing system = proper audit trails; Chat = fast but informal; Manager approval = personal but creates bottlenecks.
Customer selected quarterly frequency which matches the current default. No change needed.

operations.target_text: The maximum time frame for access termination is set at <24 business hours>
operations.replacement: Access termination must be completed immediately
operations.comment: Customer requires immediate access termination. Immediate = highest security but operationally challenging; 24 hours = balanced approach; 48-72 hours = more practical but higher risk window.
Hassan Tayyab designated as policy owner responsible for access control governance and compliance oversight.
IT Manager designated as exception approver for access control policy deviations and special access requests.
IT Manager designated as violations reporter for access control policy breaches and security incidents.
